summary: This is an email forwarding a court unsealing order related to the Epstein case. It was sent by Katharine Parker from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to an unspecified recipient, with the subject 'Here is the unsealing order' and includes an attachment of the government's unsealing request and proposed order.

persons.name: Katharine Parker
persons.context: She is the sender of the email forwarding the unsealing order from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Unsealing Order Forwarded
events.description: Katharine Parker forwards the government's unsealing request and proposed order via email.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York
keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 2, 2020, regarding the unsealing of court documents in the Epstein case.
Katharine Parker, an Assistant U.S. Attorney, is the sender of the email.
The email includes an attachment titled '2020-07-02,_GM,_government_unsealing_request_and_proposed_order.pdf'.
The correspondence originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (nysd.uscourts.gov).
